page.title: 10LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: People today spend most of their spare time watching T.V. video films and playing computer games.Young people can join clubs like the Junior or senior Youth club,boys'and girls' Brigade,Brownies or guides,and Air Cadets,or attend Disco dancing,horse riding ,or sports clubs for football, tennis,cricket, or travel to the local Sport's Centre for most indoor sports. Village pastimes include,fox hunting, roller skates,B.M.X. cycling,country walks jogging or reading.At the local village hall or Commuinity centre adults can attend luncheon or dancing clubs,choose library books,play whist, cake decorating,carpet bowls;join a craft,singles,dressmaking,chess.Keep fit or floral club and even watch films.Leisure time is spent in pubs and clubs,drinking,playing pool,bingo, dominoes,quoites,pigeon racing,darts.
